name: Coleopteran Swarm
startIntroPart1: Tayzzyronth, Seedmind of the Coleopteran Swarm. From spore to spire, your children multiply without end. The roots writhe beneath foreign soil.
startIntroPart2: Will you consume all in your path? Will your hive eclipse the stars? Prove to them: what grows cannot be killed — it only spreads.
introduction: I am Tayzzyronth, voice of the Many. Your biomass will serve us well.
neutralHello: Stillness is inefficient. We prefer motion. And growth.
hateHello: The Swarm blooms — and you are in the way.
tradeRequest: Exchange strengthens nodes. Offer what you can. We will grow it.
uniques: Reveals the entire map <upon turn start>
[1] free [Warrior] units appear <upon turn end> <in [All] cities>

civilopediaText.text: The Coleopteran Swarm is not a nation — it is a directive. Propagation is their law, From desert cracks to city ruins, they grow. Every death feeds the Swarm. Every enemy is an opportunity for more.
The Swarm must be aggresive yet cautious, the death of the [Swarm Mother] means the death of the swarm
You want quickly find a way to evolve your swarm queen to quickly swarm your enemies

civilopediaText.test: Each existing swarmling will slowly drain your [Biomass], ensure that you have enough to feed your army or your swarm will slowly die and gain debuffs
